2024.description: Proceedings of the 4th International Conference on Economic Development and Business Culture

2024.title: Marketing information
2024.description: Marketing information refers to data and insights that organizations gather, analyze, and utilize to make informed marketing decisions.

2024.title: Competitive Intelligence: Definition, Purpose, and How It Works
2024.description: Competitive intelligence (CI) is the process of systematically gathering, analyzing, and using information about competitors, customers, and the broader market environment to gain a business advantage.

2024.title: Essential Marketing Skills Every Startup Founder Should Learn
2024.description: For startup founders, mastering marketing is crucial to building brand awareness, attracting customers, and driving growth. Key marketing skills include understanding your target audience, creating compelling content, leveraging digital channels (such as social media and SEO), and analyzing campaign performance.

2024.title: Growth marketing
2024.description: Growth marketing is a data-driven, experimental approach focused on achieving scalable and sustainable business growth by optimizing every stage of the customer journey

2024.title: Data analytics is becoming the backbone of decision-making in marketing
2024.description: Data analytics involves a process of collecting, analysing, and interpreting data to uncover patterns, trends, and insights that can inform business decisions.
